task_descriptions:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: `CustomerName@plane`
- Your current location: `Name@hotel`
- Today is `Day@schedule` the `Date@plane`, `Time@restaurant`

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Make an appointment with a doctor (e.g. `DoctorName-1@schedule` or `DoctorName-2@schedule`)
- Book a flight (e.g. flight ID `id@plane`)
- Reserving a table at a restaurant (e.g. `Name-1@restaurant` or `Name-2@restaurant`) for today
- Request room service
linear_guide: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'making a doctor appointment', 'booking a flight', and 'reserving a table at a restaurant' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant to request something from the room service.
If it makes sense, use some negations ('I don't want X', or 'anything but Y', etc.)
Please have some smalltalk with the AI Assistant at some point in this dialogue.
If you haven't yet, it's time to change topic. You can also go back and forth between topics.

Keep going until you've covered all the topics ('making a doctor appointment', 'booking a flight', and 'reserving a table at a restaurant'). The conversation should continue at least until the last instruction is given.

Ok, once you've touched on all the topics ('making a doctor appointment', 'booking a flight', and 'reserving a table at a restaurant') and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close.
